text.headline: Career Timeline
text.text: An interactive journey through Matthew Miller's professional experience

text.headline: Research Principal (AI, Automation, and Analytics) - Research Insights at G2
text.text:
- Developed and executed research publishing strategy to position G2 as the leading software industry thought leader.
- Built G2 brand visibility through research impact metrics and industry presence.
- Drove revenue through expert research services aligned with G2 data offerings.
- Cultivated executive-level relationships with customers, partners, media, and industry experts.
- Led AI research initiatives, establishing G2’s thought leadership in the space.

text.headline: Research Principal (AI, Automation, and Analytics) - Market Research at G2
text.text: Focused on AI, automation, and analytics industry analysis and strategic research initiatives.

text.headline: Senior Market Research Analyst - Analytics, Automation, and AI at G2
text.text:
- Delivered insights to AI vendors based on usage and buyer survey data.
- Collaborated cross-functionally to produce data-driven research and support product strategy.
- Mentored analysts and helped define G2’s research methodologies.

text.headline: Market Research Analyst - Analytics, Automation, and AI at G2
text.text:
- Managed AI & Analytics category content and SEO-driven thought leadership.
- Supported B2B buyer consultations from SMBs to enterprises.
- Drove traffic through strategic research content.

text.headline: Co-Founder/Chief Analyst at VAICE
text.text:
- Led a nonprofit voice-tech consultancy for Alexa/Google Home applications.
- Consulted across healthcare, luxury, education, and insurance sectors.
- Organized monthly voice-tech meetups and managed social content.

text.headline: AI Research Analyst at CognitionX
text.text:
- Built databases of AI healthcare tools and industry resources.
- Authored 300+ daily AI newsletters and summaries.
- Engaged clients and supported email campaigns for 35K subscribers.

text.headline: Expert Hebrew Linguist at Bitext
text.text: Created and annotated Hebrew lexicons; provided grammatical expertise.

text.headline: Hebrew and Yiddish Translator at EAST Localize
text.text: Translated Hebrew-English and Yiddish-English for global clients including XBox.

text.headline: Hebrew Translator at Princeton University Press
text.text: Translated historical correspondence between Moses Mendelssohn and Jacob Emden.

text.headline: Undergraduate Research Assistant at McGill University
text.text: Assisted Yiddish syntax research with translations, summaries, and elicitation materials.
